content: increase the next 3 single_crochet single_crochet the next 3 single_crochet increase the last single_crochet 18 single_crochet 3 working in back loop only single_crochet around 18 single_crochet 4 single_crochet in first 8 single_crochet double_crochet decrease double_crochet decrease these two decreases form the toe single_crochet in last 6 single_crochet 16 single_crochet 5 single_crochet in first 7 single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet decrease single_crochet in last 5 single_crochet 14 single_crochet 6 single_crochet in first 6 single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet decrease single_crochet in last 4 single_crochet 12 single_crochet 7­17 single_crochet around 12 stuff the leg/foot then sew closed i usually single_crochet across the top leave a long tail for sewing to the body ears small round ears make 2 with ww yarn and f hook or hook needed to obtain gauge the chain 1 at the end of each row should not be counted as a stitch 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring chain 1 turn 2 increase every other single_crochet chain 1 turn 9 3 single_crochet in every single_crochet 9 tie off and leave a long tail to attach ears to head* small pointy ears make 2 with ww yarn and f hook or hook needed to obtain gauge 1 4 single_crochet in magic_ring 2 increase every other single_crochet 6 3 increase every other single_crochet 9 4 single_crochet around 9 5 increase every 3rd single_crochet 12 6 single_crochet around 12 tie off and leave a long tail to attach ears to head* faces face template for bear bunny kitty and puppy use this template to cut out a felt circle and embroider nose and mouth tails long skinny tail make with ww yarn and f hook or hook needed to obtain gauge 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 2 single_crochet around until desired length tie off and leave a long tail to attach ears to head*
